rows.label: qst200601_msg0002
rows.name: Something up, Kubira?

rows.label: qst200601_msg0004
rows.name: ...Kubira?

rows.label: qst200601_msg0005
rows.name:
Do not address your
King so lightly, serf.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0006
rows.name:
I was merely indulging in a
spot of... contemplation.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0007
rows.name:
Sorry... It's just, you seemed to
be a bit down in the dumps...

rows.label: qst200601_msg0008
rows.name:
Well. I suppose I should
reward you for displaying
devotion to your monarch.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0009
rows.name:
As such, I will overlook your
demeaning attitude this once.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0010
rows.name:
As you know, I was once
the ruler of a nation.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0011
rows.name:
Where is my kingdom now? Whither my
people? What has become of them?

rows.label: qst200601_msg0012
rows.name:
These questions plague
me most every day.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0013
rows.name:
Yet tragic though it be, I possess
no memories of that time.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0014
rows.name:
As such, I have no way of knowing
my one-time kingdom's fate.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0015
rows.name:
And look at me now. Reduced to
serving beneath a mere Driver.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0016
rows.name:
What cruel twist of fate has
turned monarch into servant?

rows.label: qst200601_msg0017
rows.name: Dunno if we can help you with that one.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0018
rows.name:
Yeah...it's just how
Blades and Drivers work.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0020
rows.name:
You may not have any memories,
but perhaps there could be records
left of this nation of yours?

rows.label: qst200601_msg0021
rows.name:
Aha! Dear Meleph, you may have
hit upon an excellent point.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0022
rows.name:
Though I remember it not, it was a
kingdom fitting for my personage.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0023
rows.name:
Surely such a great land
cannot have been forgotten
from history entirely.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0024
rows.name:
My retainers! Your new
task is to obtain records
of my past great deeds!

rows.label: qst200601_msg0025
rows.name: Do records like that even exist...?

rows.label: qst200601_msg0026
rows.name:
If we are going to find them,
I guess it'll be in history
books or ancient texts.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0027
rows.name:
Precisely, my dear Zeke! You
are a loyal retainer indeed.

rows.label: qst200601_msg0028
rows.name: Now, our goal is set!

rows.label: qst200601_msg0029
rows.name:
Let us visit bookshops throughout the
land, seek ancient records, and uncover
the truth of my lost kingdom!

rows.label: qst200601_msg0030
rows.name: The quest is afoot!
